trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_SEQ_00<tab>Zero wishes to know your next destination.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_TODO_00<tab>Wait at the designated location outside Meghaduta.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Zero at Saltwind's Welcome.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_TODO_02<tab>Gather information near the Hamsa Hatchery.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Nahbdeen.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_ESTINIEN_000_000<tab>Vrtra has quelled the tempest within his heart. He should be fine.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_YSHTOLA_000_005<tab>That Azdaja's eye hasn't succumbed to Darkness bespeaks her incredible resilience.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_YSHTOLA_000_006<tab>So let us trust in this sign that she yet lives, and be not deterred in our efforts.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_VARSHAHNBIG_000_010<tab>I must apologize for my bout of melancholy. To be so easily shaken ill becomes a great wyrm.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_VARSHAHNBIG_000_011<tab>You have remained at my side and ever offered me support and encouragement. I haven't the words to thank you.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_020<tab>Am I right in assuming that we are to return to the void?
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_VARSHAHNBIG_000_022<tab>Now that matters here have been settled, yes. But first, we should return to Radz-at-Han to prepare. When everyone is ready, let us convene at Meghaduta.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_030<tab>We know the fiend was headed north...
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_031<tab>But that still leaves a lot of ground for us few to cover.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_032<tab>We need a way to conduct our search more efficiently. Do you have any ideas?
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_A1_000_001<tab>I know people who may have seen something.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_A1_000_002<tab>We split up and make inquiries.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_033<tab>In other words, we seek help from the locals? If you think it best, then very well.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_034<tab>So. Where to, then?
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_035<tab>In other words, we seek help from the locals? If you think it best, then very well.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_036<tab>So. Where to, then?
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_037<tab>The Great Work and the encampment at the Hamsa Hatchery? If both places are to the north, then the people there may indeed have seen something.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_038<tab>Very well, I will head to the Great Work, and leave the encampment to you.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_NAHBDEEN_000_038<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Is this about the happenings at the Bhaflau remnants?
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_IMHUDI_000_040<tab>Saw the light over at the Bhaflau remnants too, did you? We've sent scouts to investigate, but they've yet to report back.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_IMHUDI_000_041<tab>We will continue to keep watch here, but if you learn anything, be sure to let us know.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_KHUTEEYU_000_042<tab>These fishermen saw a fiend emerge from the Bhaflau remnants before heading north, you say?
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_KHUTEEYU_000_043<tab>I saw what I thought was a ball of flame flung from the explosion, but now I wonder...
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_KHUTEEYU_000_044<tab>It flew north, in the direction of Khadga. If it is in fact a fiend, then we have trouble on our hands. We must remain vigilant.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_IMHUDI_000_050<tab>Ever since that explosion, we've seen nothing else unusual come from the waters, but there's no telling what our scouts may report.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_KHUTEEYU_000_055<tab>In case you're unfamiliar, Khadga is the massive rock formation that juts out over the water. That's where the ball of flame flew.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_NAHBDEEN_000_060<tab>I presume you've come to investigate the explosion at the Bhaflau remnants as well.
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_NAHBDEEN_000_061<tab>We've yet to ascertain precisely what happened. Is there any information you can share with us?
TEXT_AKTKMJ107_04676_NAHBDEEN_000_062<tab>A fiend emerged from the explosion and flew towards Khadga!? By the Sisters! Had I learned of this sooner─never mind. There is no time to waste!
